context:
* The George Brown College theatre programs' graduating students will host live, online performances of Alistair Newton's "The Witch of Edmonton" in August 2021 via YouTube.
* Donations are being accepted for the COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund instead of admission fees.
* The fund supports George Brown College students who have experienced financial hardships due to the pandemic.
* 100% of donations will go to the fund.
* Donors will receive a tax receipt for donations of $20 or more by email.
* Gabriella Goutam can be contacted at gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 3289 for more information on making a donation or supporting students.
* For questions about "The Witch of Edmonton" play, contact Cindy.Bautista@georgebrown.ca.
